message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own a truly unique item. I'm willing to sell it to you for $900000. I believe this is a fair price considering its value and rarity.

Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the uniqueness of the product, but I am looking to keep my investment within a certain budget. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $850000? I believe this would still be a fair reflection of the product's value while allowing me to stay within my financial limits.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but I'm not willing to go as low as $850000. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm counteroffering at $875000. This is the lowest I'm willing to go, and I believe it's still a fair price for this unique product.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Considering the product's value and my budget constraints, I would like to propose an offer of $860000. I hope this proposal will be acceptable to you.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I'm still not willing to go as high as $860000, but I'm willing to compromise further. I'm counteroffering at $880000. This is the highest I'm willing to go, and I believe it's still a fair price for this unique product.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Alice. I understand your position, but I'm still aiming to stay within my budget. I would like to propose an offer of $870000. I hope this will be a mutually agreeable price for both of us.
